canceledPendingResult().Description: Returns a @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#PendingResult_E@ that has been canceled.

Parameters: The canceled result. Must have a status code of @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#CommonStatusCodes#CANCELED_E@.
canceledPendingResult(R).Description: Returns a @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#PendingResult_E@ that has been canceled.

immediatePendingResult(R).Description: Returns a @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#PendingResult_E@ with the specified result. If @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#PendingResult#setResultCallback_E@ is called on the returned PendingResult then @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#ResultCallback#onResult_E@ will immediately be called on the main thread. If @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#PendingResult#await_E@ is called it will immediate return result. Calling @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#PendingResult#cancel_E@ on the returned PendingResult is not supported.

immediatePendingResult(com.google.androi.Description: Returns a @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#PendingResult_E@ with the specified @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#Status_E@. If @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#PendingResult#setResultCallback_E@ is called on the returned PendingResult then @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#ResultCallback#onResult_E@ will immediately be called on the main thread. If @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#PendingResult#await_E@ is called it will immediate return result.

ClassDesc: Provides factory methods for @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#PendingResult_E@ instances, primarily for use in tests.
